description: Product Description Eliminate all traces of nail polish quickly and effectively with Nail HQ 100% Acetone Nail Polish Remover. This easy-to-use remover is formulated to dissolve even the toughest nail polish, glitter, gel, and acrylics with minimal effort. Make your manicure removal process a breeze with our nail polish remover! PETA Approved – Cruelty-Free & Vegan Friendly. How to Use: • Nail Polish: Soak cotton pad with nail polish remover, gently wipe nail until polish is removed. • Gel Polish: Soak cotton pad with nail polish remover, wrap it on the nail with foil, leave it for 10-15 minutes for effortless removal. • Acrylics: Soak your nails in a bowl of acetone remover for 10-20 minutes. After, gently buff the acrylics off with a nail file. Repeat until the acrylic Is removed. Ingredients Acetone Directions Soak cotton pad with nail polish remover, gently wipe nail until polish is removed. Soak cotton pad with nail polish remover, wrap it on the nail with foil, leave it for 10-15 minutes for effortless removal. Soak your nails in a bowl of acetone remover for 10-20 minutes. After, gently buff the acrylics off with a nail file. Repeat until the acrylic Is removed. Safety Warning Keep out of reach of children. Highly flammable liquid and vapour. Causes serious eye irritation. May cause drowsiness or dizziness. Repeated exposure may cause skin dryness or cracking. Keep away from heat, hot surfaces, sparks, open flames and other ignition sources. No smoking. Keep container tightly closed. IF INHALED: Remove person to fresh air and keep comfortable for breathing. IF IN EYES: Rinse cautiously with water for several minutes. Remove contact lenses, if present and easy to do. Continue rinsing. Get medical help if you feel unwell. Manufacturer Contact Information Manufactured for: Invogue Ltd., PO Box 4775, Ascot, SL5 5DR, UK. EU RP: Personal Care Regulatory Ltd., Digital Office Centre, Road Swords, Dublin, K67 E5AO, Ireland. See more
